apis.title: Key Value API
apis.help: This API lets you save any app specific content in key-value pair format. You can store phone numbers or address or anything like that and read it from anywhere in the app. For example: email=contactus@nube-noodle.com

apis.title: Organization API
apis.help: This API lets you manage your company information, such as address, locations, contacts etc.

apis.title: Email API
apis.help: This API lets you send email from website to any email address

apis.title: Shopping Cart
apis.help: This API lets your customer check out items online. Payment is not part of this api

apis.title: Payment API
apis.help: This API lets your customer check out items online. Payment is not part of this api

apis.title: Menu API
apis.help: This API lets you save and show menu items you want to sell. Very handy API for restaurants to manage food menu.
